body.name: REENUO Portable Camping Fan, Small Tent Fan with Hanging Hook, 40 Working Hours Rechargeable USB Battery Fan with LED Lights for Desk, Bedroom, Travel & Emergency Kit

Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 4 hrs 33 mins
features: BRIGHTER & COOLER & QUIETER --- REENUO camping fan built-in 12 LED blubs with 3 brightness, designed with 3 different wind speeds, and whose noise is lowered to 30dB, could provide cooling air circulation in any desired direction with 360° rotation.

WORKING LONGER --- Built in a rechargeable 5000mAh battery, this battery operated fan can last for 5 - 34 hours working time depending on different speeds. If using the LED light only, it can last for 9 - 220 hours depending on different brightness. With the standard USB charging cable, the fan can be fully charged via the equipment with USB connectors like a power bank, adapt, or car charger within 3-4 hours.

VERSATILE USAGE --- With a built-in hook at the bottom, the small fan can be hung on tents and branches, inside a car, etc. It also can be placed on the desk or mounted on the wall. One of the best choices for camping, sleeping, traveling, reading, and so on.

PORTABLE & DURABLE --- This portable small fan is made of high-quality ABS material, which can prevent ordinary impact, so you can confidently use it on various outdoor occasions. Small sizes can be easily put in your backpack. It will not occupy your extra space when you don't use it.
CAMPING ESSENTIAL --- This haning fan is a combination of a tent fan and a camping lantern, it can make you feel a good breeze and brings you brightness in darkness for your camping trip.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose this REENUO fan? This is a multi-functional, suitable for multi-scene camping fan, whether it is outdoor activities, wild camping or indoor work, it can be competent. You can see that this fan is designed with great care, supporting vertical and horizontal 360-degree rotation, three wind speeds and two light levels to freely adjust the wind speed and light brightness, so you can enjoy the coolness as you like. It is the perfect choice for summer.

1.OUTDOOR This camping fan is suitable for most outdoor scenarios. It provides strong wind power to bring you cool breeze when you are barbecuing, picnicking or trekking outdoors. 2.CAMPING This tent fan is equipped with hooks at the bottom, he can hang on the tent, tree branches perfect for the camping environment. when the night falls, the fan built-in Led light can bring you light. 3.INDOOR It is also an excellent desktop fan, stable chassis to ensure that it can run smoothly even at maximum wind speed, to solve your worries about the heat in the office or study.

1.Extra large battery capacity Built-in 5000 mAh large capacity battery. 2.Flexible and rotatable Three speed adjustable, fan vertical 270 degrees and horizontal 360 degrees can be freely adjusted. 3.Rechargeable battery Built-in rechargeable battery, supports charging through multiple channels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little fan
reviews.reviewText: works great and the lights bright. Take it on trips for camping or even at a hotel. Battery life’s okay but if they’re plugged in they can run constantly which is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these fans and I love them. The battery life is crazy at the lowest speed and it still moves a fair amount of air. I use one as a fan to disburse the scent from my wax melt warmer and the my son uses the other at night because is a warm sleeper. They are also very quiet. On low, I can barely hear it from about 8 feet away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, multi-functional...and works great!
reviews.reviewText: The Reenuo fan is an impressive little product. It's marketed as a "camping" fan, which certainly makes sense. It's small and light weight, which means it would be easy to pack in and out of a campsite. The fan has settings for multiple speeds and provides a surprisingly strong air-flow for its size, a built-in LED with 3 brightness settings (which will provide plenty of light for anything you might need to do in your tent after dark), a hanging hook (which folds flat into the base) so you can set the fan on a flat surface or suspend it from an overhead support if desired. The fan housing, itself, can rotate 360 degrees on both the horizontal and vertical axis, allowing you to aim the airflow exactly where you want it. Though it is marketed as a camping fan, I actually bought to add to a post-hurricane emergency kit for use in any power outage situation. Luckily, I haven't had to use it in that kind of scenario yet but I'm confident that it would perform well and be a welcome piece of equipment in an emergency of that sort. One thing, specifically, that supports that expectation is that the two rechargeable (and easily accessed and replaceable) 18650 lithium batteries that the unit includes are still showing a nearly full charge 6 months after the fan was added to the emergency prep kit. That's some pretty impressive storage performance and means a high likely hood that the fan will still work if a power outage catches you off-guard and you didn't have a chance to prepare by charging up all your batteries to max beforehand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wanting a remote while remote in Alaska
reviews.reviewText: Reviewing from Alaska, I've used this mostly to get some air circulation in the tent while camping on weekends. We've had a really mild summer so far (50s and 60s with the odd 70s day temps) so I've found it most beneficial when I need to cool off while/after pitching camp.Pros:+ The battery lasts a long time. I don't know if it meets the stated times but it's longer than I've need so far in overnight camping.+ It is small and light and easy to lose in all the camping gear.+ It moves a good amount of air. The second setting is great for when I'm trying to get a fire started and general use in the tent.+ It is pretty silent until you get to the highest setting and even then it isn't loud.+ The built-in folding hook makes it easy to hang from the center hook in my tent or folds into the base to set on a desk/table.Cons:- I wish it came with a remote or some tactile difference between the FAN and LED buttons. Or better yet, a button for the light and a dial for the fan.- It uses a micro USB connection to charge in an era where everything else is USB C or fruity hold-out's connection.- It's a bit bulky. I would have really appreciated if the fan holding arms were straight and collapsed into a flatter package or could roll/tuck the base into the fan assembly. It takes up about as much space as my compressible sleeping bag does in pack/trunk.Meh:~ The rubber feet are standard stick on so expect to replace one or two when they get rubbed off in packing.~ The lowest fan setting can hardly be felt a couple of feet away (which is why I mentioned starting the fire with the medium setting).~ I have knocked the folding hook loose from the base a couple of times but it snapped right back in.~ The lowest setting of the light maybe work as a night light (though this hasn't been an issue during Alaska's summer "nights"). Even at its highest everything else I carry which has a light, including power banks, has a brighter light.It's small enough that I plan to bring it with me when I travel. May update it in a few weeks after I come back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect small fan
reviews.reviewText: We put this in our small home gym, it works perfect, and is quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong Little Fan, Ideal For Many Uses
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been really pleased with the purchase of this little powerful fan. I mainly use it inside of our home sauna to create better airflow, but I saw in a lot of reviews people using it for camping and other outdoor applications, which I have no doubt it’d work great for as well. With 3 power settings and 2 LED light settings, you have the flexibility to meet your various needs. I’ve found that I like to use it on the second fan setting as that’s more than enough to create some air circulation in the sauna. I charge it every 4-5 sauna sessions of 20-25 minutes each, and have never had it run out of battery yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My most favorite Amazon buy ever
reviews.reviewText: I do not travel without this fan! It goes camping with me, to hotels, airbnbs, family’s houses, every where! It helps me sleep cool and comfortably. My husband and I absolutely love this fan. I tell everyone about this fan. I enjoy that it can be charged to work cordless and it can operate while charging. I have had my two fans for over 2 years and they both continue to work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars One night stand
reviews.reviewText: The fan is pretty cool, no pun intended. Good lighting, nice and quiet fan on low but the battery will last only one night. I used the light and fan, both on low four about four hours while reading. I then used (or attempted to use) the fan on low for the rest of the night. It quit sometime during the night. I purchased this combination as it was smaller and more portable. The other which was only slightly more expensive ($5) will last three nights between charges. Compact isn't always better.
